title: Parameter - CSS Font Name
description: The parameter is echoed as a font value. Font name parsers often fail to sanitize correctly.
body:
CSS Injection (Font Name)

The input is placed inside the font-family property.

Param: ?q=

Inspect this element's font.
objectives: Inject a malicious font name or break the property.
Observe how quotes interact with the injection.
Attempt to inject a background-image via 'expression' (IE legacy) or break out.
hints: Try adding quotes: ' Courier New'; font-size: 50px
Sometimes sanitizers allow quotes in font names, which aids in breaking context.
